item.name: Application Key to Back, Right Control + Application to Forward
Change minus ( - ) to underscore ( _ ) when Caps Lock is on
item.appendix: For users who have Shift to turn off Caps Lock, this lets you type
while leaving the Caps Lock on.
An unusual side effect: Typing the underscore will cause the Caps Lock light to switch off,
but typing another letter will turn the Caps Lock light back on.
